title: Jan 28: {P} What makes Paris look like Paris?

cells.data:
## Overall thoughts
Seems quite trivial, also not sure why they used fixed-sized patches when they were going to train an SVM anyways...

## Presentation

Visual elements needs to be frequent and discriminative.
"Geo-supervised" approach (positive and negative sets, positive from paris)

Histogram of Oriented Gradients
(for each patch, find average gradient in the whole image)
